conbody.p: The Start Page appears by default every time you open . However, you can always open this Start Page by navigating to Help > Start Page.

In the Start Page, you can see your current version, edition, and license information, including the expiration date. You can also navigate to our Plugin Store, Help Center, Documentation page (Tutorials), and Academy.
You can also find here advice on testing best practices, hot discussions from our forum, release highlights, and news.
